name: ACH_FIGHTER_BERSERK
description: As a Fighter, use the skill "Berserk" next to an enemy.

name: ACH_FIGHTER_CHARGE
description: As a Fighter, kill a ranged enemy with Charge.

name: ACH_FIGHTER_TALENTS
description: As a Fighter, buy the "Enrage" and "Frenzy" talents in the same run.

name: ACH_FIGHTER_ATTACK20
description: As a Fighter, get your Attack stat to 20 or higher.

name: ACH_FIGHTER_BUBBLINGRAGE
description: As a Fighter, start with the perk "Constant Bubbling Rage" and then fill your skill bar.

name: ACH_FIGHTER_LEVEL1
description: As a Fighter, clear an Act without spending talent points on Hard difficulty or higher.

name: ACH_WIZARD_FIREBALL
description: As a Wizard, kill an enemy in one hit with Fireball.

name: ACH_WIZARD_INSPIRATION
description: As a Wizard, have "Inspiration" trigger three times in a row.

name: ACH_WIZARD_ENSLAVE
description: As a Wizard, clear an Act with a live enslaved enemy.

name: ACH_WIZARD_LEECH
description: As a Wizard, Leech enemies 10 times.

name: ACH_WIZARD_MAGICSPELLS
description: As a Wizard, completely fill your skill bar with Magic spells.

name: ACH_WIZARD_ACT3_SCD
description: As a Wizard, completely clear the Mage Academy (3-4) of enemies on Suicide difficulty.

name: ACH_WIZARD_ALLIES
description: As a Wizard, have five or more allies at one time.

name: ACH_THIEF_SNEAKATTACK
description: As a Thief, kill an enemy with a Sneak Attack.

name: ACH_THIEF_STEALTH
description: As a Thief, complete 1-1 without alerting a single enemy.

name: ACH_THIEF_NINJA
description: As a Thief, use Shadow Walk to disappear while nearby enemies are blinded.

name: ACH_THIEF_DISCOUNT
description: As a Thief, buy something with "Discount" while holding more than 500 gold.

name: ACH_THIEF_SPEED20
description: As a Thief, get your Speed stat to 20 or higher.

name: ACH_THIEF_ACT1
description: As a Thief, pick up all items in Asterion's Lair (1-7) before killing the boss.

name: ACH_RANGER_BOW
description: As a Ranger, kill an enemy with "Bow" at the very edge of your vision.

name: ACH_RANGER_STEALTH5
description: As a Ranger, get your Stealth stat to 5 or higher.

name: ACH_RANGER_BLOODLINK
description: As a Ranger, share 20 health or more with Dog via "Blood Link".

name: ACH_RANGER_POISONARROW
description: As a Ranger, kill an enemy with the damage-over-time effect of "Poison Arrow".

name: ACH_RANGER_DOG
description: As a Ranger, clear an Act without Dog falling unconscious.

name: ACH_RANGER_ACT1_SCD
description: As a Ranger, kill all enemies in the Village and Forest (1-1 to 1-3) on Suicide difficulty.

name: ACH_PUGILIST_UPPERCUT
description: As a Pugilist, kill a stunned enemy with an Uppercut.

name: ACH_PUGILIST_KNOCKBACK
description: As a Pugilist, kill a ranged enemy by knocking another into them with Knockback.

name: ACH_PUGILIST_DODGE
description: As a Pugilist, dodge three attacks in a row using the "Reflexes" talent or "Boxer's Boots".

name: ACH_PUGILIST_UNARMED
description: As a Pugilist, max out the Unarmed talent.

name: ACH_PUGILIST_ITRAVELLIGHT
description: As a Pugilist, clear an Act using the "I Travel Light" perk on Suicide difficulty.

name: ACH_CLERIC_DISPEL
displayName: This Is Your Brain On Magic
description: As a Paladin, stun a spellcaster with "Dispel".

name: ACH_CLERIC_MAGICBURN
description: As a Paladin, suffer Magic Burn a total of ten times.

name: ACH_CLERIC_ACT2
description: As a Paladin, clear the Monastery (Act 2) without killing a Dark Paladin.

name: ACH_CLERIC_WRATHOFGOD
description: As a Paladin, do over 100 damage in one use of "Wrath of God".

name: ACH_CLERIC_CONSECRATE
description: As a Paladin, clear an Act using a Consecrated starting weapon.

name: ACH_CLERIC_NONCOMBATANT
description: As a Paladin, clear an Act using the "Noncombatant" perk.

name: ACH_ALCHEMIST_UNLOCK
description: Unlock the Alchemist class.

name: ACH_ALCHEMIST_PISTOL
description: As an Alchemist, one-shot thirty enemies with Pistol.

name: ACH_ALCHEMIST_ACT3_HARD
description: As an Alchemist, clear the City (3-2 and 3-3) of enemies on Hard difficulty or higher.

name: ACH_ALCHEMIST_SPELLBOOK
description: As an Alchemist, Combine two items to produce a Spellbook.

name: ACH_ALCHEMIST_LEGENDARIES
description: As an Alchemist, use a Legendary item while carrying Legendary equipment and a Legendary weapon.

description: Try out three different classes.

name: ACH_3CLASS_1PERK
description: Unlock perks for three different classes.

name: ACH_MISC_SAMPLEVIAL
description: Use a Sampling Vial on a boss to draw blood.

name: ACH_MISC_HARDCORE

description: Unlock the Ranger class.

description: Unlock the Pugilist class.
